confirm.title: AIS EASY
confirm.description:
###### ![logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_easy/icon.png?v2)

The AIS EASY integration allows you to communicate with Eaton Easy PLC. 
 Do you want to set up new AIS EASY integration?

settings.title: AIS EASY - connection settings
settings.description:
We add the interface to PLC Eaton Easy.

 ###### ![logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_easy/logo.png?v2)

To communicate with PLC, you need to provide the PLC web server host and the token,  [Details in the documentation ](https://www.ai-speaker.com)

 Fill in the form below and click **SUBMIT** button.

inputs.title: AIS EASY - input settings
inputs.description:
We add the interface to PLC Eaton Easy.

 ###### ![logo](https://ai-speaker.com/images/brands/ais_easy/logo.png?v2)

To communicate with PLC, you need to provide the PLC settings,  [Details in the documentation ](https://www.ai-speaker.com)

 Fill in the form below and click **SUBMIT** button.
